page.title: 07A day in the life of a mum
page.content: Dominic and Marie-Threse dress themselves and I dress John comb their hairs and off they go to school.First I sort out the washing and put it in my Automatic machine.I put in my{Ariel {Automatic}powder and{Comfort Softner. I get a box of toys out for Mark so that I can get something done.After doing the dishes and tidying the kitchen I go into the living-room and because it is a good day I have no fire to light. After hoovering and a quick rub around the furniture with {MR.Sheen}polish I go upstairs and make the beds. Continental quilts are very handy just a shake and a straighten up and that is the bed.I get{Jif}and clean the bath,then a sprinkle of {Harpic}down the toilet to kill germs.
